fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, decide if you wish to stay up and patrol the town.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you patrol, you will prevent a random evil's attack by saving their target, even if the attack was astral or indirect.
- You cannot prevent suicides or town-aligned attackers. However, you can prevent an evil from killing another evil.
- Disguises and frames will not influence who you can protect.
- You will learn the would-be victim's name, or if (somehow) no evils attacked anyone that night.
- The person you save won't know you rescued them.
- If you haven't patrolled in the previous night, the attacker will only learn that their target was rescued by a hero.
- If you patrol two nights in a row, the attacker will also learn your name, and you will be unable to speak in the following day.
- If you choose to patrol a third night in a row without resting, you will automatically die at the end of the night, even if someone tries to heal or protect you.
